lead_paragraph: Aston Martin has set up a venture with the Chinese consumer electronics group LeEco to jointly develop an electric vehicle.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Aston Martin and LeEco Plan to Develop Electric Car
headline.main: Aston Martin and LeEco Plan to Develop Electric Car

snippet: Aston Martin has set up a venture with the Chinese consumer electronics group LeEco to jointly develop an electric vehicle.
abstract: Aston Martin announces joint venture with LeEco to develop electric vehicle.
